01.name: Classic Nubuck
01.description: Nubuck upper / Quilted nappa leather heel / Waxed laces / Metallic rivets / Nubuk flag with embossed logo / Calf skin leather lining / Exclusively designed outsole / Made in Italy

02.name: Classic Grain
02.description: Leather upper / Quilted nappa heel / Calf skin leather lining / Leather flag with debossed logo / Waxed laces / Metallic rivets / Exclusively designed outsole / Made in Italy

03.name: Judoka
03.description: Water repellent nubuk upper / High density military canvas inserts / Natural tanned leather lining / Custom lacing system on the toe box / Waxed laces / Metal rivets on the heel / All round seamed cupsole / MADE IN ITALY

04.name: Judoka Stop
04.description: Water resistant gummed leather upper / Nylon inserts / Leather lining / Custom lacing system on the toe box / Nylon laces / Metal rivets on the heel / All round seamed cupsole / MADE IN ITALY

05.name: Gumsole Mid S
05.description: Nubuck upper / Calf skin leather lining / Leather reinforcement on the toes for an improved fit / Tubular laces / Metallic rivets / Nubuck flag with subtle embossed logo / Updated with all around stitched outsole / Made in Italy
